definition: to make into/to change into/-ization/to ... -ize/to transform/abbr. for 化學|化学[hua4 xue2]
abbr. for 期貨合約|期货合约[qi1 huo4 he2 yue1], futures contract (finance)
merchandise or commodities available immediately after sale/merchandise in stock/available item/actuals (investment)/actual commodities
to return merchandise/to withdraw a product

sentences.english: The store is closing out tomorrow; I'll go and buy a pair of shoes.
sentences.chinese: 商店明天有廉價貨銷售，我去買雙鞋。

sentences.english: Which lager can claim to be truly German? This can.
sentences.chinese: 哪種大罐啤酒可稱得上是地道的德國貨？這罐。

sentences.english: And we also have the possibility of offering the services of a supply vessel.
sentences.chinese: 拼箱貨船貨轉運以及供應船的服務。

sentences.english: I'm interested in an iron cross second class . an original.
sentences.chinese: 我對這個鐵十字感興趣，二流貨，原物。

sentences.english: It is required for surveyor to check draft after completion of first batch of cargo.
sentences.chinese: 第一票貨完工後需要商檢看水尺，請做好準備。

sentences.english: Some of the clothes I like best are hand-me-downs.
sentences.chinese: 我最喜歡的一些衣服是傳下來的廉價貨。

sentences.english: I got to get this truck unloaded and on the way back to the ware house before dark.
sentences.chinese: 我得把這車貨卸完，在天黑前趕回倉庫去吶。

sentences.english: At present, the company production and sales of major products for the circular-shaped A and miscellaneous goods.
sentences.chinese: 目前，公司生產，銷售的主要產品爲圓形及雜形A貨。

sentences.english: We'll pick out the damaged cargo in the slings during loading, provided there is any.
sentences.chinese: 裝貨過程中我們會撿出關內殘損貨，如果有的話。

sentences.english: This Wang Shi is ten insides 8 country renowned malicious merchandise, who also challenge not provoke to ange.
sentences.chinese: 這趙王氏可是十里八鄉有名的潑辣貨，誰也惹不起。

sentences.english: Have you got this kind of bulb and this type of megger on sale?
sentences.chinese: 這種燈泡與這種兆歐表有貨供應嗎？

sentences.english: She's a real foodie, she likes seafood, pasta, dessert and so on.
sentences.chinese: 她是個十足的喫貨，她喜歡海鮮，意麪，甜品等等。

sentences.english: It seemed that many of the Tibetans did not reject all the Chinese products.
sentences.chinese: 多數藏民對中國貨似乎並無抵制。

sentences.english: And we continue to import Made-In-China goods at a break-neck rate.
sentences.chinese: 我們繼續以驚人的速度進口中國貨。

sentences.english: We aren't able to accumulation the third ad fifth items .
sentences.chinese: 第三中舉五項目，我們沒有貨供給。

sentences.english: The cargo oil tanker area has continuous double bottoms and side cabins to protect.
sentences.chinese: 貨油艙區域有連續的雙層底和邊艙保護。

definition: to sell/to betray/to spare no effort/to show off or flaunt
only/merely/no more than/but/however/anyway (to get back to a previous topic)/cannot be more (after adjectival)
to estimate/to reckon/CL:個|个[ge4]/(coll.) to suppose
